title: Survival: Humor
marks:
Signature, Inscription, Edition, Stamp and Chop
 LRC,  in pencil: [Jaune Q T S Smith]
description: yellow ground; abstracted paper doll-like Native American figures at left and right; round-faced sketchy cartoon head with crossed arms, upside down, at top, in grey, black and rust; pair of grey hands making shadow figure at center; train in grey, LRC; figures on horses in grey, LLC; running Native American and horse on top of grey images, LLC; stick figures and coyote in black, LRC; black typeface and handwritten text; \"HUMOR\", upside down, at bottom
creditline: The Patricia and Peter Frechette Endowment Fund and the James and Maureen Duffey Endowment for Prints and Drawings
